properties.name: Edmonton Ski Club - Edmonton, AB, Canada
properties.description: Posted by Kramer60edmonton, abSkiing in the heart of Edmonton. Established in 1911, the Edmonton Ski Club is a not for profit member owned and operated society.

properties.name: Fernie Alpine Resort, Fernie, BC, Canada
properties.description: Posted by Kramer60Fernie, BC, V0B 1M6Fernie is located in the southeast corner of British Columbia in the beautiful Canadian Rocky Mountains. The local region is often referred to as the Elk Valley (name of the valley we\'re in) or the East Kootenays. Fernie is physically located along Highway #3 (also called the Crowsnest Pass Highway), 50 km west of the Alberta/BC border. Distances to other centers: Calgary, Alberta 326 km 203 mi

properties.name: Fortress Mountain Resort, Kananaskis, AB, Canada
properties.description: Posted by Kramer60Fortress Mtn Resort, Kananaskis, AB, CanadaLocated just an hour west of Calgary in Kananaskis Country.

properties.name: Lake Louise Mountain Resort, Lake Louise, AB, Canada
properties.description: Posted by Kramer60Lake Louise, AB, T0L 1E0Located in the heart of historic Banff National Park, Lake Louise is a world class ski-area in a World Heritage site. Four full service lodges are strategically placed so that the entire area is comfortably available to all users. Lake Louise has consistently been voted number one for scenery and value in North America by Skiing Magazine.

properties.name: Marmot Basin, Japser, AB, Canada
properties.description: Posted by Kramer60  Jasper, AB, T0E 1E0Only 20 minutes from the town of Jasper, Marmot Basin provides 84 named trails on over 1,675 acres of terrain supported by world class facilities. The mountain offers 3,000 vertical feet of skiing and snowboarding on 100% natural, dry, Rocky Mountain powder.

properties.name: Nakiska, Kananaskis, AB, Canada
properties.description: Posted by Kramer60Kananaskis, AB, T0L 2H0At 83 km (52 miles) from the Calgary City limits, Nakiska is a short 49-minute drive from town. Just head west on Highway 1 (towards Canmore & Banff), then south on Highway 40, and you\'ll be here before you know it.

properties.name: Rabbit Hill Snow Resort, Edmonton, AB, Canada
properties.description: Posted by Kramer60edmonton, ab t6j 6m7Rabbit Hill is located southwest of Edmonton. Weekend bus service: http://www.rabbithill.com/maps&buses.html To download a map: http://www.rabbithill.com/pdf/map.pdf

properties.name: Snow Valley - Edmonton, AB, Canada
properties.description: Posted by Kramer60edmonton, ab, t6j 6m7Skiing and snowboarding located just off the Whitemud Freeway on 119 Street, at the south end of Whitemud Park.

properties.name: Sunshine Village, Banff, AB, Canada
properties.description: Posted by Kramer60Banff, AB, T1L 1J5Sunshine Village is located just 15 minutes from Banff in the Canadian Rockies. Banff is about 1 1/2 hours from Calgary on a well maintained four lane highway.

properties.name: Tawatinaw Valley, AB, Canada
properties.description: Posted by Kramer60Tawatinaw, ABAlpine / Nordic Centre - downhill, snowboard, cross country, telemark One hour (70km) north of Edmonton (past Nestow on Highway #2)
